title: No Emotes In-game
body:
Very frequently, my emote 'plate' becomes empty.
Yes I did check that I'm equip with the emotes before game.
And yes I have did a full repair which didn't work. (several times actually)
The frequency is unbearable, I encounter the bug almost 2/3 of the games.
Is there anyone else having the same problem? Help pls.

replies.body: Lots of people have been experiencing this bug, it's WAY worse when it happens in the new Odyssey game mode. Because for some reason it ALSO un-equips all your augments, and without augments you start at level 6 and are super under powered for the higher difficulties like Onslaught. Haven't heard of any fix yet.
